title: Finance Overview Dashboard
overviewContent: I developed a finance overview dashboard designed to provide a comprehensive snapshot of the organisation's financial health. This dashboard consolidates key financial metrics and visualisations, enabling stakeholders to quickly assess performance and make informed decisions. By incorporating interactive elements and user-friendly navigation, I ensured that users can easily access vital financial information, improving overall visibility and facilitating strategic planning.

skills: Database: Maria DB, Azure SQL Database
jd: Evaluated UI/UX design by working closely with a designer.
Developed a Power BI report to track cash received, debt, and WIP.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Wrote technical documentation and end-user manuals.
